title: Windows Subsystem for Android now runs Android 12L and gets lots of improvements
content:
Microsoft is rolling out an update for the Windows Subsystem for Android for Insiders running the latest build of Windows 11 in either the Dev or Beta channels. This update, version 2204.40000.15.0, brings along a ton of improvements, starting with the fact that WSA now runs Android 12.1, which is more commonly known as Android

The post Windows Subsystem for Android now runs Android 12L and gets lots of improvements appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft is rolling out an update for the Windows Subsystem for Android, including advanced networking support and many other improvements.
